es.text: El Estándar de Datos de Contratación Abierta

en.title: Open Contracting Data Standard: Documentation - About
Design
en.text: This phase is about setting up your OCDS implementation to be a success.

en.title: Merging - Merge routine
en.text:
To create a compiled or versioned release, you must:
Get all releases with the same ocid value

en.title: Merging - Array values
en.text: If the input array contains anything other than objects, treat the array as a literal value. Otherwise, there are two sub-routines for arrays of objects: whole list merge and identifier merge.

en.title: Merging - Whole list merge
en.text: An input array must be treated as a literal value if the corresponding field in a dereferenced copy of the release schema has "array" in its type and if any of the following are also true:
